Key Match Events: Denver dominated the overtime period, holding San Antonio scoreless until 2:11 left in overtime (a 7-0 run).
Peyton Watson’s two free throws brought the game to a tie with a little more than two minutes left to play.
Post-Match Reflections: San Antonio Spurs star Victor Wembanyama’s birthday celebrations probably will be toned down a bit after the Spurs lost 122-111 in overtime to the Denver Nuggets on Sunday night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Spurs’ bench as a whole outscored the Nuggets’ bench, 43-18.
Others: San Antonio will have just one day off before traveling to Chicago for a Monday night game against the Bulls. Tip-off is set for 7 p.m.
